name: admin-static
description: Frontend static assets for Nutmix Admin Dashboard

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.js --bundle --minify --outdir=dist/js/ && mkdir -p dist/css/ && cp *.css dist/css/
scripts.dev: esbuild src/index.js --bundle --outdir=dist/js/ && mkdir -p dist/css/ && cp *.css dist/css/
